alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued June 25 at 3:03PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... FLASH FLOOD WARNING CANCELLED FOR TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS . Rainfall has become less heavy over the islands. However, a Flash Flood Watch remains in effect through Sunday. UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 300 AOAULI ASO TOANA`I IUNI 25 2022 UA IAI NEI SE ...UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA SWAINS . Ua faaitiitia timuga i luga o le Atunu`u. Peita`i, o le a tumau pea le nofo vaavaaia i luga o le atusamoa e oo atu i le Aso Sa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Mo ave-taavale, aua ne`i uia nofoaga po o ala-tele ua lolo-vaia. Ia aga`i atu i nofoaga mapu`epu`e. Ia ripotia tulaga louloua o le tau i le ofisa o le TEMCO. E latou te faailoa mai i le Ofisa o le Tau a outou ripoti.
info.instruction: Remain cautious when driving in low lying areas...and report any flooded roadways to the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
